info.title: Cards Channel App
info.description: Application serving card domain backend for frontend application - card info, creation and settings.

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: Module responsible for obtaining information about customer

tags.name: Card PIN Validation
tags.description: Module responsible for validating PIN code

tags.name: Card Encryption
tags.description: Module responsible for obtaining public keys from MPTS system

tags.name: Card Status
tags.description: Module responsible for changing card status

tags.name: Card Settings
tags.description: Module responsible for adjusting card settings

tags.name: Cards Creation
tags.description: Module responsible for creating cards and obtaining information about them

tags.name: Card Plastic Order
tags.description: Module responsible for ordering plastic card

tags.name: Card PIN
tags.description: Module responsible for setting card PIN code

tags.name: Card Limits
tags.description: Module responsible for setting and suspending card limits

tags.name: Card Credentials
tags.description: Module responsible for handling security data and tokenization

post.description: Service enabling to retrieve encrypted CVC, which is used for multiple actions related do Card data, incl. card data, PIN, card tokenization.

parameters.name: X-Representative-Id
parameters.description: Identification number of a representative - should be the same as X-Customer-Id

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A random value in a UUID v4 format that provides a request traceability

400.description: Bad Request - Possible codes: NOT_CARD_OWNER, INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, CARDS_LIMIT_REACHED, CLIENT_ACCOUNT_BLOCKED, FORMAT_EXCEPTION, VALIDATION_ERROR

403.description: Forbidden - X-Token may be invalid or VKS verification failed - Possible codes: SHOW_PIN_NOT_CONFIRMED, SHOW_PAN_NOT_CONFIRMED

404.description: Not Found - entity not found - Possible codes: ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_CODE, CARD_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_CODE, CUSTOMER_PACKAGE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_CODE, RETAIL_CUSTOMER_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_CODE, ACCOUNT_PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_CODE

post.description: Action enabling the customer to request for a PIN display on the mobile application. As encryption services are required from the PCI DSS perspective, PIN and other card security data actions are only available via mobile application. The action security is verified by operationId field which must point to a confirmed show PIN process.

post.summary: Get card details encrypted PAN number.
post.description: Action enabling the customer to request for a PAN display on the mobile application. As encryption services are required from the PCI DSS perspective, PIN and other card security data actions are only available via mobile application. The action security is verified by operationId field which must point to a confirmed show PAN process.

put.description: Endpoint used to initiate card tokenization using push provisioning - direct request to Google from a mobile app. It allows "one click" digitization without a need to enter card data in the Google wallet application. **Used to Verify that requesting customer is valid and is an owner of provided card.**

put.description: Endpoint used to initiate card tokenization using in app provisioning - direct request to Apple from a mobile app. It allows "one click" digitization without a need to enter card data in the iOS Wallet application. **Used to Verify that requesting customer is valid and is an owner of provided card.**

It allows to present the customer shorter emboss name options.It can be used in case of creating virtual card with plastic (there is no need to pass rbs to this endpoint).

post.summary: Validate PIN code security - NOT TO BE USED.
post.description:
<h2>NON PROD VERIFICATION ENDPOINT - NOT TO BE USED<h2>

Enables to validate provided PIN code: 
 * must be 4 digits
 * digits cannot be the same
 * digits cannot create a sequence

parameters.name: X-Representative-Id
parameters.description: Identification number of a representative - should be the same as X-Customer-Id

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A random value in a UUID v4 format that provides a request traceability

embossedLastName.description: last name of card holder to appear on plastic card

embossedTitle.description: title to appear on plastic card

accountID.description: account id number in MPTS system

cardContractNumber.description: card PAN -First six digits is BankIdentification Number (BIN), followed by a variable lengthup to 12 digits and one single check digit at the end

cardExpiryDate.description: card expiry date as year and month

cardID.description: card id number in MPTS system

cardholderID.description: card holder id number in MPTS system

cbsNumber.description: account identifier inside the core banking system UsuallyIBAN - full account number according to ISO 13616 standard

currency.description: main currency of a card ISO-4217 currency code

MptsCard.description: card data obtained from MPTS system

keyIndex.description: index of the RSA key used do encrypt IIDD

initiateDigitizationData.description: initiate digitization data generated for a card according to issuer requirements

walletCertificatesList.description: list of wallet IIDD certificates for Apple

cardExpiryDate.description: card expiry date as year and month [yyMM]

keyIndex.description: key index that was used to generate pinblock

newPINBlock.description: PIN block generated from new PIN code according to documentation

EmbossedDataDTO.description: Data to appear on plastic card. Supports special chars:        - '

firstName.description: first name of card holder to appear on plastic card

lastName.description: last name of card holder to appear on plastic card

companyName.description: company name of card holder to appear on plastic card

deliveryMode.description: delivery mode of plastic card [STANDARD, EXPRESS]

id.description: id of delivery method type 1 - STANDARD, 2 - EXPRESS

iban.description: IBAN number of an account for which card should be issued

paymentScheme.description: payment scheme of the card allowed for given customer

virtualVisualCode.description: code of the specific card appearance with which card will be presented later in virtual form (dictionary value)

plasticForm.description: flag indicating if plastic card was issued

locked.description: flag indicating if card is locked (user cannot change status)

possibleActions.description: actions possible for a card based on its actual state

items.description: actions possible for a card based on its actual state

autoRenewalForPlasticOrder.description: flag indicating if plastic card should be automatically renewed after expiration

enabled.description: flag indicating if card limit is enabled

accountMax.description: max amount of card transactions for current account

cardMax.description: global max amount of card transactions for card product

cardCurrent.description: max amount of card transactions for current card

used.description: used amount of card transactions for current card

contactless.description: flag indicating if customer prefer to always confirm the transaction with the PIN

cashWithdraws.description: flag indicating if customer do not need ATM cash withdrawals for now

ecommerce.description: flag indicating if customer do not plan ecommerce shopping

cardStripeTransactions.description: flag indicating if customer prefers to disable magstripe, that prevents transactions when card is copied

geoSecurity.description: flag indicating if GPS location is used in order to prevent fraudulent transactions

abroadPayments.description: flag indicating if all abroad transactions in Point of sales are blocked
